== Main Inclusion Report for kdeedu ==

# kdeedu source package
# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' The package is required for the Edubuntu desktop

** One 2003 vuln that affected all of KDE <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=kmessedwords&w=0|Secunia]]</nowiki>
